extendedInfo.description: Notice period widget delivers exactly what it's name says. A handy homescreen widget for tracking your notice periods - let it be your phone contract, your work or any future action. Never forget, never overbook. With this handy widget you've got your essential info with you wherever you go.* Enables tracking periods in Days, Weeks and Months.* Name your periods with custom labels to easily distinguish between them* Forever free (ad supported - only configuration dialogue)* Now you can edit existing widgets after you create them - just touch to invoke configuration dialogueMore configuration options and widget types coming soon

reviews.title: Huh? Works? How? When?
reviews.comment: I don\'t understand how this app has a 4.7 star rating, but I wish those folks had given a small sentence about how to use it. I\'ve installed twice, unless I\'m missing something, but do not see the app\'s icon in my downloads, and when I click on it in the Play Store downloads, I get this screen????? Don\'t download if you\'re short on phone space..not worth the extra never erasing bloatware when you uninstall it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says I guess. To use widget, long press your homescreen and select App Widgets in the list that pops up and choose Notice period widget~
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didnt work on my S4
reviews.comment: Just didnt, loading screen and that is all she wrote. 1star for cool loading screen.
reviews.author: John Doe
